name: HepatitisDVirusInfectionTestsForHepatitisDVirusTotalOrIgGAntibody
title: Hepatitis D Virus Infection (Tests for hepatitis D virus total or IgG Antibody)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of hepatitis D virus total or IgG Antibody.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: hepatitis D virus total or IgG Antibody),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
